name: Color Laser Shooter
body:
### Download [Color Laser Shooter](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/color-laser-shooter/id877746882?ls=1&mt=8) ### Welcome to Color Laser Shooter A stress fighting game!
You shoot the ball with required color, don't let them fall.
### Things to do before playing this game - Plug in your earphones/headphones - Turn your volume to MAX - Shoot the ball, enjoy the sound, and feel relaxed ### Screenshoots ![](http://i59.tinypic.com/28ckknr.png) ### Authors and Contributors In 2014, Alan Sparrow (@alansparrow) ### Support or Contact Email: alansparrow19@gmail.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/AlanSparrow9
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
